example.name: event as cause
example.text: How titillating it [*EXP*-4] was [*T*-3] [*] to go among people who [*T*-1] did not know him as the composer , but who [*T*-2] talked in the most glowing terms of the promise of the piece after [*] having heard the first rehearsals .
